messages.title: Make BRIDGET FOX our new MP today
messages.content: Bridget Fox will be a hardworking local MP who will put local people first. She'll be a strong voice for Islington & Finsbury in Parliament.

messages.title: 3 reasons to back Bridget and the local Lib Dems
messages.content: Bridget Fox led the campaign that saved Essex Road Post Office, got a new, safer crossing outside Angel tube, and worked with local people to save our health services at Whittington Hospital.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Just a few votes will separate the Lib Dems and Labour. Your vote could decide who becomes our new MP. Voting Tory will just help Labour win.

issues.health: Bridget Fox worked with local people to save our health services at Whittington Hospital.

leaflet.personalStatement: Bridget Fox - putting local people first
